name: A Good Chance
description:
A wizard adventure!

You are a wizard named Chance.

Your goal in this adventure is to reach your friend's house.

Your friend, Twig, lives in the forest at the base of the highest mountain in the area.

It will take several hours to reach their house.

I wonder what you will find along the way?

This game is safe for children.

It's a text-based game, but it does have images scattered throughout.
